body_html: I'll take a look. Is the command that the script used to invoke build_pip_package something along the lines of bazel run //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package -- /path/to/destination_dir?

body: I'll take a look. Is the command that the script used to invoke `build_pip_package` something along the lines of `bazel run //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package -- /path/to/destination_dir`?
